summary: So I'm really new to modding and I'm apparently really bad at it. So I want to make a cool get away for vampire characters.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2r73bt0.jpg[/IMG]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+4]Description[/size][/color][/font]

[size=+2][color=blue]Just a Note as of version 1.2 I moved the home to the swamps south of solitude, I feel, it is better fitting.[/color][/size]

First mod ever and it's bad BUT as I learn how to mod I will keep updating it. So if anyone is
interested they can see the home and my skills progress over time :D
The chest should keep your stuff safe but don't quote me on that. If it doesn't, yell at me in
the comments.
It’s really funny they're like "do you want people to ask for permission to use your mod?" I'm
like "damn, I got nothing to steal".
Oh and before I forget GIVE ME LOTS OF FEED BACK and advice (keep it kind if you can!)
You can find the house on your map it’s just southeast of Solitude.
I plan to update on a weekly basis so I can keep myself at a good pace.
There will be a Vampire themed quest and and tons more to come as I learn how to script, texture
and what not.

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+3]Detail[/size][/color][/font]

Adds a player home perfect for a vampire or dark character. Comes with crafting stations and a
cell for your vampire cattle. The "home" is more like a shack with some additions. you can find it
in the swamps southeast of Solitude and north of Morthal. There is a cage with "cattle" for your
blood sucking needs. Also I added a merchant since I've just finshed learning how to do so. There
is a buttton and a trap door to add more cattle if you over feed, it'll drop in more.


[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+3]Upgrading[/size][/color][/font]

Unless stated below just override files
[list]
[*]When updating from v1 to v.1.1 do a clean save
[*]When updating from v1.1 to v.1.2 Since I moved the location my tests shows anything in the Chest is safe,
but you have to make your save at a different location.Ex)save in Whiterun
[/list]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+3]Installation[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*]Requires Dawngaurd
[/list]

NNM:
[list]
[*]Install with manager
[*]Read any "ReadMes" (because the upgrading instructions will be there)
[*]Makes sure all your .esm's are activated
[/list]
MANUAL:
[list]
[*]Download
[*]Extract to Desktop (Makes things easier for me :D)
[*]Read any "ReadMes" and look over the files
[*]Place in Skyrim data folder
[*]Makes sure all your .esm's are activated
[/list]

[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/abh406.jpg[/IMG]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+4]Future Plans[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*]Make a god damn back story cause I was a writer in another life LoL
[*]Torturer and torture devices
[*]I wanna move the cattle to a basement
[*]I have an idea for a quest to gain entry to the shack
[*]I also wanna get the cattle to be able to follow you like the Moth priest did.
[*]Trap door
[*]Spells and weapons that will be unlocked with the home
[/list]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+4]Proudly Completed[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*]fix the fps drop when you enter
[*]Merchant NPC
[*]Moved the home to the swamps
[/list]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+4]Things I Need Help On[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*]Making switches open and close trap doors
[*]Making upgrades to the house buyable as well as achieve able through quests
[*]Making a switch that spawns a NPC at a given location (over and over again)
[/list]

Guys I get it I'm new but "I got this under control!" chill Thor~!
[youtube]gP2DtEgaa80[/youtube]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+4]History[/size][/color][/font]

17/02/2014 - Release - v1
[list]
[*]Contained House, 3 cattle and a cage.
[*]"Mysterious Shack" was located just south of Whiterun (farmland)
[/list]

17/02/2014 - v1.1
[list]
[*]Added a book that will tie into the up and coming quest. (I can't seem to get text to show
up, so its the "wolf queen" for now )
[*]I learned how to make keys so I made one lol
[*]Added crafting stuff so you can craft your stuff
[*]I put in a cage for the "cattle", and extended the wall
[*]It’s now Navmeshed
[*]Fixed some lighting and clipping issues with the exterior
[/list]

-19/02/2014 - v1.2
[list]
[*]Added a trap door for a later purpose ( hint hint wink wink )
[*]Made cattle hang in wall brace and sleep in bed roll
[*]Added new meshes and textures
[*]Moved home to swamp and "touched" up area
[*]fixed floating corner
[*]Removed blood inside to help fps drop
[*]Added button for later purpose
[*]used new meshes for interior made space for later expanstion
[/list]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+4]Tools Used[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*]Nexus Mod Manager
[*]Creation Kit.
[/list]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+4]Contact[/size][/color][/font]

Any comments or advice hit me up on the comments or send me a msg on the nexus.
Chadud@yorku.ca

This is how I feel like whist learning to mod
[IMG]http://s3.amazonaws.com/barkpost-assets/50+GIFs/40.gif[/IMG]

[font=Matura MT Script Capitals][color=red][size=+4]Legal and Licensing[/size][/color][/font]

Please seek my permission before editing this mod outside of your own use. Any changes you
make cannot be uploaded without my express permission.
You may not upload my file to any other website. If I am offline for more than 6 months and do
not respond to multiple attempts to contact me (see above),
then I give anyone permission to make changes and reupload this mod as long as I am given
credit.
